author: Abigail Ng
title: The airline industry could restart in the second quarter, says aviation exec
description: There will be a "significant rebound" in the aviation industry once borders start to open up, said Thomas Flohr of VistaJet.
content:
There will be a "significant rebound" in the aviation industry once borders start to open up, the founder of a private jet company said this week.
Air travel has been badly affected by the ongoing coronavirus crisis, with demand evaporating as countries scra… [+1909 chars]
